titleStmt.title: An argument wherin the apparaile of women is both reproued and defended
Ab urbe condita. Selections. English. 1551.
titleStmt.author: Livy.
Thomas, William, d. 1554.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the house of Thomas Berthelet Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, with loss of text.
